subject: Soccer
UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
World Cup 2018 (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Birmingham fans ran onto the field and threw flares at rival supporters following Wednesday night’s 2-1 win over local rival Aston Villa in the League Cup quarterfinals.
snippet: Birmingham fans ran onto the field and threw flares at rival supporters following Wednesday night’s 2-1 win over local rival Aston Villa in the League Cup quarterfinals.
